Module io.github.ascopes.jct
Package io.github.ascopes.jct.containers.impl

Class FileUtils

java.lang.Object
io.github.ascopes.jct.containers.impl.FileUtils
@API(since="0.0.1", status=EXPERIMENTAL) public final class FileUtils extends Object
Utilities for handling files in the file system.
Since:
0.0.1
Author:
Ashley Scopes

    • pathToBinaryName

      public static String pathToBinaryName(Path path)
      Convert a path to a binary name of a class.
      Parameters:
      path - the relative path to convert.
      Returns:
      the expected binary name.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the path is absolute.

      Convert a binary class name to a package name.
      Parameters:
      binaryName - the binary name to convert.
      Returns:
      the expected package name.

      public static String binaryNameToSimpleClassName(String binaryName)
      Convert a binary class name to a simple class name.
      Parameters:
      binaryName - the binary name to convert.
      Returns:
      the expected simple class name.

    • binaryNameToPath

      public static Path binaryNameToPath(Path directory, String binaryName, JavaFileObject.Kind kind)
      Convert a binary class name to a path.
      Parameters:
      directory - the base directory the package resides within. This is used to ensure the correct path root and provider is picked.
      binaryName - the binary name to convert.
      kind - the kind of the file.
      Returns:
      the expected path.

    • packageNameToPath

      public static Path packageNameToPath(Path directory, String packageName)
      Convert a given package name to a path.
      Parameters:
      directory - the base directory the package resides within. This is used to ensure the correct path root and provider is picked.
      packageName - the name of the package.
      Returns:
      the expected path.

    • simpleClassNameToPath

      public static Path simpleClassNameToPath(Path packageDirectory, String className, JavaFileObject.Kind kind)
      Convert a simple class name to a path.
      Parameters:
      packageDirectory - the directory the class resides within.
      className - the simple class name.
      kind - the kind of the file.
      Returns:
      the expected path.

    • resourceNameToPath

      public static Path resourceNameToPath(Path directory, String packageName, String relativeName)
      Convert a resource name that is found in a given package to a NIO path.
      Parameters:
      directory - the base directory the package resides within. This is used to ensure the correct path root and provider is picked.
      packageName - the package name that the resource resides within.
      relativeName - the relative name of the resource.
      Returns:
      the expected path.

    • relativeResourceNameToPath

      public static Path relativeResourceNameToPath(Path directory, String relativeName)
      Convert a relative class path resource path to a NIO path.
      Parameters:
      directory - the directory the resource sits within.
      relativeName - the relative path of the resource within the directory.
      Returns:
      the path to the resource on the file system.

    • pathToKind

      public static JavaFileObject.Kind pathToKind(Path path)
      Determine the kind of file in the given path.
      Parameters:
      path - the path to inspect.
      Returns:
      the kind of file. If not known, this will return JavaFileObject.Kind.OTHER.

    • fileWithAnyKind

      public static Predicate<? super Path> fileWithAnyKind(Set<? extends JavaFileObject.Kind> kinds)
      Return a predicate for NIO paths that filters out any files that do not match one of the given file kinds.

      Note: this expects the file to exist for the predicate to return true. Any non-existent files will always return false, even if their name matches one of the provided kinds.

      Parameters:
      kinds - the set of kinds of file to allow.
      Returns:
      the predicate.
